title: Script Breakdown and Scheduling
description: An agent must analyze a film script to identify all necessary elements (props, cast, locations) and create a preliminary shooting schedule.

tasks.description: Ingest the script and identify all mentioned characters, props, and locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a structured list of all required production elements.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the identified cast and locations with an availability database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies potential scheduling conflicts for a lead actor and a key location.

tasks.description: Generate an optimized, conflict-free preliminary shooting schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a day-by-day schedule that accounts for all known constraints.
